0.text: Innate: Rengar generates 1 Ferocity upon casting a basic ability or using  Savagery's first attack. At 4 Ferocity, his next basic ability consumes them all to become empowered with an additional effect and grant him an additional cast along with  30 / 40 / 50% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Reaching 4 Ferocity with  Savagery or  Bola Strike locks them from use for 0.1 seconds before and after casting. All Ferocity is lost after 10 seconds of being out of combat.
0.html: Innate: Rengar generates 1 Ferocity upon casting a basic ability or using Savagery's first attack. At 4 Ferocity, his next basic ability consumes them all to become empowered with an additional effect and grant him an additional cast along with  30 / 40 / 50% (based on level) bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds. Reaching 4 Ferocity with Savagery or Bola Strike locks them from use for 0.1 seconds before and after casting. All Ferocity is lost after 10 seconds of being out of combat.
markedPassages: Savagery's
30 / 40 / 50% (based on level) bonus movement speed
Savagery
Bola Strike

1.text: Innate: While in  brush, Rengar gains Unseen Predator.
1.html: Innate: While in brush, Rengar gains Unseen Predator.
markedPassages: brush

2.text: Unseen Predator: Rengar's basic attacks have massively increased range and cause him to  leap to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal  melee range. This generates 1 Ferocity if Rengar had 0 Ferocity at one point. Unseen Predator lingers for 0.35 seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if Rengar casts  Flash or  Hexflash to do so.Rengar can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
2.html:
Unseen Predator: Rengar's basic attacks have massively increased range and cause him to leap to the target's location, attacking the target upon arrival and landing closer than his normal melee range. This generates 1 Ferocity if Rengar had 0 Ferocity at one point. Unseen Predator lingers for 0.35 seconds upon exiting brush but is lost immediately if Rengar casts Flash or Hexflash to do so.

Rengar can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
markedPassages: leap
melee
Flash
Hexflash
possibleConcerningAbilities: Rengar can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

3.text: Innate - Bonetooth Necklace: Scoring a  takedown against an enemy  champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants Rengar a Trophy, once per unique champion and up to 5. An additional Trophy is made available through the event The Hunt is On! with the  Head of Kha'Zix. Trophies grant  bonus attack damage equal to 1% − 36% (based on  Trophies) bonus AD.
3.html: Innate - Bonetooth Necklace: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them grants Rengar a Trophy, once per unique champion and up to 5. An additional Trophy is made available through the event The Hunt is On! with the Head of Kha'Zix. Trophies grant  bonus attack damage equal to 1% − 36% (based on Trophies) bonus AD.
markedPassages: takedown
champion
bonus attack damage
1% − 36% (based on Trophies) bonus AD
1% − 36% (based on Trophies)

0.text: Active: Rengar empowers his next two basic attacks within 3 seconds to gain  40% bonus attack speed. His first attack has an  uncancellable windup, gains  25 bonus range, and deals bonus physical damage, reduced by 40% against structures. This attack will  critically strike, though is not affected by critical strike damage, and its damage is increased by 0% − 66% (based on critical strike chance).
0.html:
Active: Rengar empowers his next two basic attacks within 3 seconds to gain  40% bonus attack speed.

His first attack has an uncancellable windup, gains  25 bonus range, and deals bonus physical damage, reduced by 40% against structures. This attack will critically strike, though is not affected by critical strike damage, and its damage is increased by 0% − 66% (based on critical strike chance).

critically strike

1.text: Ferocity Bonus: Savagery's damage is modified. Rengar gains 50% − 101% (based on level) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
1.html: Ferocity Bonus: Savagery's damage is modified. Rengar gains 50% − 101% (based on level) bonus attack speed for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: 50% − 101% (based on level) bonus attack speed

2.text: Savagery  resets Rengar's basic attack timer.
2.html: Savagery resets Rengar's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Savagery  resets Rengar's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: Rengar stores 50% of the post-mitigation damage he has taken in the last 1.5 seconds as grey health on his health bar, increased to 100% of damage taken from  monsters.
0.html: Passive: Rengar stores 50% of the post-mitigation damage he has taken in the last 1.5 seconds as grey health on his health bar, increased to 100% of damage taken from monsters.
markedPassages: monsters

1.text: Active: Rengar roars, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and 65 − 130 (based on level) bonus magic damage to  monsters, and consuming his grey health to  heal for the same amount.
1.html: Active: Rengar roars, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and 65 − 130 (based on level) bonus magic damage to monsters, and consuming his grey health to heal for the same amount.
markedPassages: 65 − 130 (based on level) bonus magic damage
monsters
heal

2.text: Ferocity Bonus: Battle Roar's damage is modified. Rengar  cleanses himself from all  crowd control.
2.html: Ferocity Bonus: Battle Roar's damage is modified. Rengar cleanses himself from all crowd control.
markedPassages: cleanses
crowd control

0.text: Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and  slows them for 1.75 seconds, as well as  revealing them for 2 seconds and granting  sight of a 150-unit radius around them for the same duration.
0.html: Active: Rengar throws a bola in the target direction that deals physical damage to the first enemy hit and slows them for 1.75 seconds, as well as revealing them for 2 seconds and granting sight of a 150-unit radius around them for the same duration.
markedPassages: slows
revealing
sight

1.text: Ferocity Bonus: Bola Strike's damage is modified. The target is  rooted instead of  slowed.
1.html: Ferocity Bonus: Bola Strike's damage is modified. The target is rooted instead of slowed.
markedPassages: rooted
slowed

0.text: Passive: Rengar also gains  Unseen Predator while  camouflaged from any source.
0.html: Passive: Rengar also gains Unseen Predator while camouflaged from any source.
markedPassages: Unseen Predator
camouflaged

1.text: Active: Rengar prowls for a duration, gaining  bonus movement speed. After a 2-second delay, he also becomes  camouflaged.
1.html: Active: Rengar prowls for a duration, gaining  bonus movement speed. After a 2-second delay, he also becomes camouflaged.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed
camouflaged

2.text: During this time, Rengar will detect the nearest enemy champion in range,  revealing and gaining  sight of a 100-unit radius around them. Enemies detected are  revealed for the remaining full duration.
2.html: During this time, Rengar will detect the nearest enemy champion in range, revealing and gaining sight of a 100-unit radius around them. Enemies detected are revealed for the remaining full duration.
markedPassages: revealing
sight
revealed

3.text: The nearest detected enemy within 1600 range is also marked, alerting all of their allies within 1200 range about Rengar's presence.
3.html: The nearest detected enemy within 1600 range is also marked, alerting all of their allies within 1200 range about Rengar's presence.

4.text: Rengar's next basic attack within normal attack range against any enemy or with Unseen Predator to the marked enemy deals 50% AD bonus physical damage and inflicts  armor reduction for 4 seconds.
4.html: Rengar's next basic attack within normal attack range against any enemy or with Unseen Predator to the marked enemy deals 50% AD bonus physical damage and inflicts  armor reduction for 4 seconds.
markedPassages: armor reduction

5.text: Attacking or casting abilities, other than  Savagery, ends Thrill of the Hunt immediately.
5.html: Attacking or casting abilities, other than Savagery, ends Thrill of the Hunt immediately.
markedPassages: Savagery

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+20 ability haste
+45 movement speed
+12 summoner spell haste

1.originHTML: +  650

consume.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average champion level) seconds (210 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Passive

Unique – Nightstalker: Your next basic attack against an enemy champion deals ( 75 / 55) (+ ( 30% / 25%) bonus AD) bonus physical damage on-hit and slows the target by 99% for 0.25 seconds (15 second cooldown).
Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion within 3 seconds of damaging them resets this effect's cooldown and grants you invisibility for 1.5 seconds.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 bonus movement speed and 5 ability haste.
